name: ip_lookup
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool checkleakedcc_official.
Tool description: CheckLeaked.cc official api implementation to obtain results from experimental / dehashed search.
API description: This function performs an IP lookup using the provided IP address and returns the geolocation details. It utilizes the IP Whois Geolocation API from RapidAPI.

ip.description: The IP address (IPv4 or IPv6) to look up.
